title: Shrinkify Entwicklungsprojekt
description: Web-based file compression tool designed for seamless CMS integration. Shrinkify enables structured uploads, automated optimization and role-based workflows for content managers and asset owners, focusing on usability, security and scalable processing of large media files.

detail.overviewHeadline: A modular web application for automated file compression in CMS-driven environments.
detail.overviewMeta: Shrinkify streamlines large media handling through intuitive upload flows, structured processing and clear role separation between asset owners and content managers.
detail.processHeadline: The system architecture balances usability, security and technical constraints.
detail.processMeta: Frontend, backend and conversion logic were structured around defined ADRs to ensure maintainability, scalability and future integration into existing CMS workflows.
